short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quick Login as admin: Simplifying Troubleshooting and Resolution and Empowering Administrators!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes it easier for admins to login to the Salesforce org as another user. 👨🏻‍💻

💻 How to use:
🔹After installation, Login to Salesforce org (OR) Refresh the Page, and Click on the extension icon. (wait for a while).
🔹If you have more than 2K active users in your organization the popup may take some time to appear the first time.
🔹Last Refreshed date shows you when user data was obtained. If you have added new users please refresh so that you can see the newly added users in the popup.
⛔️This tool provides you Login Link but may not allow some users to login due to salesforce minimum permission or some restriction.


🔍Highlights:
🔹Supports Classic and Lightning.
🔹Displays all active users with search feature.
🔹When a user is selected, it logs you in as that user and keeps you on the page you were viewing.
🔹When you log out, it will take you back to the page you were originally on when you logged in as the other user.
🔹Only active users and excluded portal users will be displayed,
-
Thank You. Please Support
